$metadata.description: Design tokens powering the LKANY interface theme.

color.$description: Color primitives including ramps and semantic themes.

primary.$description: Brand reds used for primary actions and key highlights.

accent.$description: Supporting crimson accents for surfaces, focus states, and data viz.

neutral.$description: Slate neutrals tuned for typography, backgrounds, and borders.

success.$description: Positive greens aligned to success and confirmation states.

info.$description: Calming blues for informational messaging and highlights.

warning.$description: Amber hues signalling caution, warnings, and pending actions.

danger.$description: Alert reds for destructive and error messaging.

light.$description: High-contrast light palette optimised for airy surfaces and clarity.

dark.$description: Immersive dark palette optimised for dashboards and nighttime use.

components.$description: Component-level design tokens that compose button and badge surfaces.

typography.$description: Responsive typography primitives used across the UI hierarchy.

families.$description: Preferred font families for core typographic contexts.

weights.$description: Weight tokens that align UI text hierarchy with brand voice.

spacing.$description: Spacing scale applied to layout gutters and paddings.

layout.$description: Layout tokens ensuring mobile-first spacing and balanced reading widths.

radii.$description: Border radius tokens for surface treatments.

shadow.$description: Shadow tokens for depth and elevation.

motion.$description: Motion tokens for animation duration, easing curves, and media preferences.

mediaQueries.$description: Media queries that inform motion responsiveness.

aliases.$description: CSS custom property aliases grouped by theme mode.
